persona.name: Skyler
persona.bio: Skyler, a 36-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for their competitive edge and frugal approach to investing. With years of experience navigating the volatile crypto markets, Skyler combines a keen analytical mind with a cautious, often pessimistic outlook, ensuring every move is calculated and risk-averse. Their disciplined strategy and ability to anticipate market downturns have earned them a reputation as a savvy and reliable trader in the crypto community.
